Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 56th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1982...
Injured on 7/11/1984 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1988, off Cliff Speck (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1988, off Scott McGregor (ATL)...
Drove in 7 runs against New York (N) on 6/4/1991...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 7/15/1991...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (N) on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: CF B. Giles, RF S. Green, C G. Williams. Going to NYM: LF G. Sheffield, 2B R. Gant, RF T. Benzinger, P J. Jones)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1993, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 9/21/1993 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1994, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 9/21/1994 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
